= Introduction =

= Details =
1.colorComponent = 0.5 * normalComponent + 0.5;
  normalComponent = 2 * (colorComponent - 0.5);

2. Vector3 A = [a1, a2, a3]
   Vector3 B = [b1, b2, b3]
   A X B = [a2b3 - a3b2, a3b1 - a1b3, a1b2 - a2b1]
